title: Red
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Western, Buffet, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Red - Die grüne Küche roughly translates to "Red - The green kitchen/table." It's a mix of bar, take-away, buffet, and gourmet restaurant. Everyday there is a main dish for approx. 7€ and a colorful buffet. Waiters don't bring the food to the tables. Also offers pastry and freshly pressed juices. Vegan and allergy friendly options.
